name: TitleUrlCopy And WithoutHyphenCopy
author: Marimo
description: 1: When you press command+c(mac) or ctrl+c(win) with no character selected, save the page title and URL on the clipboard. 2: When you press command+c+c(mac) or ctrl+c+c(win) with no character selected,Make a copy with out the hyphen on the clipboard.
